node.title: Woman who allegedly escaped Adelaide CBD medi-hotel arrested after four days
node.alt: CCTV showing a woman who allegedly absconded from an Adelaide medi-hotel.
node.description: A woman who allegedly escaped a medi-hotel in Adelaide's CBD via the fire escape and was wanted by police for four days has been arrested.
node.content:
["A woman who escaped\u00a0a medi-hotel in Adelaide's CBD\u00a0via the fire escape and was wanted by police for four days has been arrested.", "Police said 35-year-old Samantha Sullivan (also known as Samantha McNeven) had travelled to Adelaide from\u00a0Darwin and was taken to the Pullman Adelaide, a\u00a0COVID-19\u00a0quarantine hotel on Hindmarsh Square.", "They alleged she \"absconded\" on Saturday,\u00a0leaving the hotel at about 7:45pm.", "In a statement, SA Police said after an \"extensive investigation\", Ms Sullivan\u00a0was arrested\u00a0on Wednesday.", "Ms Sullivan was apprehended just after 9pm\u00a0at Mile End, police said.", "She was charged with breaching the emergency management act and was refused bail to appear in the Adelaide Magistrates Court today.", "Prior to allegedly escaping the medi-hotel, Ms Sullivan had tested negative to COVID-19.", "", "
Do we really need booster shots for COVID-19?
"]
